quest_desc.qdesc: 300136(성역의 꽃다발) 데커드에게 퀘스트 수락. 아르젠타에게. 숲의 성역에서 각 맵마다 있는 데이비드와 대화. 보스클리어 후 데이비드와 대화. 성역의 꽃다발 습득. 아르젠타에게 꽃다발을 주고 보상을 받음. 3번 퀘스트로.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Argenta$
Tired of waiting.
(You must receive the quest from Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard to proceed.)

$Adventurer David$
Looks like you need this.
Free for a year! Hahaha!
(You must receive the quest from Deckard to proceed.)

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
How's silver haired lady lately?
I suppose you visit her from time to time?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Yes, I guess its possible to do so... </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
She might look strong on the outside, but deep down she is just a beautiful, fragile woman.
You should really lend her a hand sometimes
<html>$In The Grand Scheme of Things$</html>

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
That's right! .
Not that I need to remind you, but she's your savior after all! Haha!

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
That's right! .
Not that I need to remind you, but she's your savior after all! Haha!

$Adventurer David$
Looks like you need this.
Free for a year! Hahaha!
(You must receive the quest from Deckard to proceed.)

$Argenta$
{user_nick}, where have you been?
You are late?

$Argenta$
What's this?
Is this the way you treat your savior?

$Argenta$
Oh! Noisy!
I was thinking what can I give you for your help.
I hard a hard time choose something suitable for a weakling like you.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Once your savior, always your savior. Remember that.
You are no different from those cruel ogres if you forget this!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Does it still hurt a lot? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I'll need Sanctuary Bouquet. The...flowers in it can be used to heal for my wounds.
Even a cat could bring me a flower bouquet. So I pressume can handle that, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> I don’t think that I feel there is any problem... </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
No... of course not! These wounds are nothing to me!
I just...want to get back to my full strength quickly. In case you do something stupid again.

$Argenta$
Why do you have so much to say?
Just do it, go to Forest Sanctuary and find me the Sanctuary Bouquet. And it better be fresh!

$Argenta$
Be fast now!
You will get it from me if you are late! (Unable to perform quest under party status)

$Argenta$
Do you need me to explain to you again? In the Forest Sanctuary, you'll see some flowers. Bring those to me. Stupid.

$unidentified boy$
Ha! Even Nether King Gonzalez is no big deal! Ha! Ha! Ha!

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
Who are you?
Looks like you are here to see me
You poor little amateur… do you want my autograph?

$Adventurer David$
Now Wait! All these monsters are responsibility of Great Adventurer David!
If you want to improve your reputation look elsewhere! Heard that?

$Adventurer David$
Flowers? What flowers? Flower are found the in neighbourhood!
Hmph! Well, these flowers also belong to Great Adventurer David! You better hand those flowers over or I will not forgive you!

$Adventurer David$
Hey! Just who are you to ignore me? Anyway, I will not let you have the flowers that are here, touch it and you will be sorry.
(You really should get away from this person to pick the flower bouquet.)

$Adventurer David$
You! You will regret this! You will regret not begging me for my permission!
(You should pick flowers elsewhere. This guy is clearly not stable.)

$Adventurer David$
Heh! Heh! Heh! We meet again, rookie.
Looks like you followed me all the way, trying to beg for forgiveness?

$Adventurer David$
Huh! Obviously you are not making sense.
You still plan to take those flowers?! Let me repeat myself one more time, those flower are my...

$Adventurer David$
Now, wait a minute!
Okay, I shall make an execption and you are allowed to pick the flowers. Am I awesome or what?

$Adventurer David$
Then again, a weakling like you I suppose won't be making out here alive. How about a bargain of 100 gold for my help? What do you say?

$Adventurer David$
Too late! I'm taking back my offer. No way I am helping you even if you beg for my help.
(You should get away from this mad man to pick the flower bouquet in peace.)

$Adventurer David$
You are so gonna regret for not asking my help!
(What a mad person! Get the flower bouquet somewhere far away from this crazy person.)

$Adventurer David$
Now this sword is for killing all monster at one go, is not that I am afraid of them or anything like that. Do you understand?

$Adventurer David$
So you want to talk business? Okay, how about this I shall sell you thos bouquet of flower at special discount price?

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
That's a special price.
With that 50 gold, it comes with escort service, I personally will get you out of here safely!
Ha! Ha! Ha!

$Adventurer David$
Are you sure you are not going to consider it? This is you last change!
(You need get away from this mad person in order to get the flower bouquet.)

$Adventurer David$
You will be so sorry, You gonna regret!
(Will you ever be rid of this guy? Look elsewhere for the flower bouquet.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> I can see you hiding there.... </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh! Nice. Then again, if it was me, I would've kill that beast in one blow.
But you quite good for newbite, I guess! Ha! Ha! Ha!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I thought you had finish picking those flowers?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
What do you mean by I'm running around from a fight!
I was just... making the Sanctuary Bouquet. So, there. Ha!

$Adventurer David$
Monster here are too weak for me, I see it as a good chance for you to brush up your skills.
Seems like you are those ungrateful sort that don't worth the trouble!
(Adventurer David his head away.)

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
Guess I have no need for this Sanctuary Bouquet.
You can have it, just thank me will do.
(Adventurer David hand you the Sanctuary Bouquet into your hands.)

$Adventurer David$
Take this as a reward, taking the effort to follow me all the way here.
Time for you to get going, I will finish up the rest from here!
(Adventurer David poses, , gazing with pride into the sky..)

$Adventurer David$
Heh Heh.. You this newbie need more tips from me?
(Adventurer David is still looking at the heaven far away.)

$Argenta$
Well, I never thought that you are this stupid..

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well.. Is quite a long story to begin with.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Seems like you are more dumb than I expected.
What took you so long for just a bunch of flowers?

$Argenta$
{user_nick}! This isn't even enough to wrap my toe. Do you have any idea what you are doing?

$Argenta$
(She sighs.)
Is okay, You look pretty exhausted and will fall anytime. .
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Argenta$
This is making me hungry.
Are you ready for the next errand?

$Argenta$
Let me see what am I lacking off...
Hmm. You wait awhile, give me some time to think of it.

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
You mean you got Silver haired lady a bouquet of flower? Wow you are quick, woman like flowers. Nice!

$Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard$
Is good to see that you treat you savior so well.

journal.title: Adventurer's Guild Master Deckard's Worries
journal.contents:
Argenta wants you to run some errands for her. Go to the Gray Ruins and meet Argenta.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins

journal.title: Argenta's Request
journal.contents:
Argenta needs a Sanctuary Bouquet to heal her wounds. Go make a Sanctuary Bouquet from the white flowers in the Forest Sanctuary.
(You cannot proceed while in a party.)

Gray Ruins → Forest Sanctuary
journal.destination: (Solo) Collect the Sanctuary Bouquet from the Forest Sanctuary
journal.todo_msg: Collect the Sanctuary Bouquet from the Forest Sanctuary.

journal.title: Strange people
journal.contents:
You are unable to collect the flower to due some strange guy named Adventurer David. Move further in to find a place to gather flowers in peace.

Gray Ruins → Forest Sanctuary
journal.destination: Explore Forest Sanctuary in search of the Sanctuary Flower Bouquet
journal.todo_msg: Venture deeper into the Forest Sanctuary.

journal.title: The Mighty Adventurer David
journal.contents:
You still can't get the flowers you need because Adventurer David is blocking you. Run away from him.

Gray Ruins → Forest Sanctuary
journal.destination: Explore Forest Sanctuary in search of the Sanctuary Flower Bouquet
journal.todo_msg: Venture deeper into the Forest Sanctuary.

journal.title: Annoying Adventurer David
journal.contents:
Adventurer David can't seems to leave you alone. Try shaking him off.

Gray Ruins → Forest Sanctuary
journal.destination: Explore Forest Sanctuary in search of the Sanctuary Flower Bouquet
journal.todo_msg: Venture deeper into the Forest Sanctuary.

journal.title: Unexpected bouquet
journal.contents:
Adventurer David finally just gave you a Sanctuary Bouquet. Might as well bring it to Argenta.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Argenta in the Gray Ruins
